entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @SenTomCotton @SpeakerPelosi You are either brain washed or brain dead. Possibly both. This is the coronavirus. And this leadership was totally unprepared for it, despite the intelligence and its warnings.  You and your gop party are not working for the people. You, too, are passing the buck!
